alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 6:02PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ANIMAS RIVER BASIN...SOUTHWEST SAN JUAN MOUNTAINS...AND SAN JUAN RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 602 PM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Bayfield to 7 miles northeast of Ignacio and moving east at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This squall will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Animas River Basin, southeastern Southwest San Juan Mountains and west central San Juan River Basin Counties. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 103 and 131. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
